definition: member of the senior ministerial class (old)/scholar (old)/bachelor/honorific/soldier/noncommissioned officer/specialist worker

sentences.english: Programmes on the radio and TV are in Welsh.
sentences.chinese: 電臺和電視節目都是用威爾士語。
這個威爾士語的地名可譯成“蘭茲角”。

sentences.english: He wrote lyric poems of his own in English, for he did not speak the Welsh language.
sentences.chinese: 他不會說威爾士語，所以用英語寫抒情詩。
